description: Calling of get_mac_by_pci_address in _populate_pci_mac_address() missed parameter 'pf_interface' of True although 'pci_dev.dev_type == obj_fields.PciDeviceType.SRIOV_PF', and this will result in incorrectly 'dev_path' and incorrectly 'if_name' after calling of get_mac_by_pci_address().
title: Calling of get_mac_by_pci_address() missed True 'pf_interface'

comments.content: Calling of get_mac_by_pci_address in _populate_pci_mac_address() missed parameter 'pf_interface' of True although 'pci_dev.dev_type == obj_fields.PciDeviceType.SRIOV_PF', and this will result in incorrectly 'dev_path' and incorrectly 'if_name' after calling of get_mac_by_pci_address().
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~liu-yong8

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/349271
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Could you please add steps-to reproduce, and also more details on how this affects whole code path?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tdurakov

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/349271
Reason: This patch has been sitting unchanged for more than 12 weeks. I am therefore going to abandon it to keep the nova review queue sane. Please feel free to restore the change if you're still working on it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: There are no currently open reviews on this bug, changing the status back to the previous state and unassigning. If there are active reviews related to this bug, please include links in comments.
